message:
"Blue Veins, Golden Thrones"

Through corridors of power sleek,
In hushed whispers, nobles speak.
Unseen threads of lineage tweak.

In mosaic pride they bask,
Veiled beneath their jeweled mask,
High turrets, their daunting task.

Through the shadows soft they creep,
Rich secrets in vaults they keep,
While common hearts beat and weep. 

In hushed whispers, nobles speak,
Through corridors of power sleek,
Unseen threads of lineage tweak.
